comments.body: Same story with the license file. Please include the license file in `MANIFEST.in`.
I'm using the archive from github which has all the files and I added the license_file line. The next release will also have updated MANIFEST.in but it will not happen soon.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +34,38 @@about:
  home: http://photon-hdf5.github.io/phconvert
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: 'Convert and write Photon-HDF5 files.'
